long_description: ASICS GEL-Scout(TM) trail-running shoes provide full ground contact and use full outsole coverage for great protection and ground feel when you're logging lots of miles on rough trails. Synthetic leather/nylon mesh uppers feature supportive cage structure around soft mesh linings for great comfort and durability. EVA polymer midsoles with gel inserts in the heels and forefeet damp shock on impact and encourage a smooth stride. Rock protection plates keep sharp rocks and sticks from hurting the soles of your feet. Gusseted tongues prevent debris from getting into the shoes. Aggressive lugs ensure excellent traction on rough trails. ASICS GEL-Scout(TM) trail-running shoes have small pockets on the tongues that give you a place to tuck the laces in so they won't snag on sticks.
short_description: ASICS GEL-Scout(TM) trail-running shoes provide full ground contact and use full outsole coverage for great protection and ground feel when you're logging lots of miles on rough trails.
